snippet.title: LittleBigPlanet 2 Cross Controller Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/littlebigplanet-3/?emcid=or-1s-412983

LittleBigPlanet 2 Cross Controller - Experience LBP in a whole new way by using your PS Vita as a controller for LBP2! LBP 2 Cross Controller is an add on pack for LittleBigPlanet 2.

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.  LittleBigPlanet is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.
